var::Array< T, size_value > Class Template Reference
Inheritance diagram for var::Array< T, size_value >:

Documentation

template<typename T, u32 size_value>
class var::Array< T, size_value >

The Array class is a template used to contain a standard C array.

It provides methods to access the array safely.

Public Member Functions

Member Function Documentation

template<typename T , u32 size_value>
const T& var::Array< T, size_value >::at ( u32  idx) const
inline

Returns a read-only item of the index value specified.

Parameters
idxThe object index

If the idx exceeds the size of the array, SObject::exit_fatal() is called.

template<typename T , u32 size_value>
T& var::Array< T, size_value >::at ( u32  idx)
inline

Returns an item of the index value specified.

Parameters
idxThe object index

If the idx exceeds the size of the array, SObject::exit_fatal() is called.
